scripts.type-check: if ! command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo '(apps/widget-server) skipping type-check: go not found'; exit 0; fi && mkdir -p .cache/go-build .cache/go-mod && GOCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-build GOMODCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-mod go test ./... -run '^$'
scripts.lint: if ! command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo '(apps/widget-server) skipping lint: go not found'; exit 0; fi && mkdir -p .cache/go-build .cache/go-mod && GOCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-build GOMODCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-mod go vet ./...
scripts.ci: if ! command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo '(apps/widget-server) skipping ci: go not found'; exit 0; fi && mkdir -p .cache/go-build .cache/go-mod && GOCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-build GOMODCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-mod go vet ./... && test -z "$(find . -name '*.go' -not -path './.cache/*' -print0 | xargs -0 gofmt -l)"
scripts.test: if ! command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo '(apps/widget-server) skipping test: go not found'; exit 0; fi && mkdir -p .cache/go-build .cache/go-mod && GOCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-build GOMODCACHE=$(pwd)/.cache/go-mod go test ./...
